resources.string: Enable or disable data (3G) connection. You can also enable/disable data outside this application, there won\'t be any conflitcts

Data Manager will automatically turn on/off data connection after a defined period of time when screen is OFF. Connection will be disabled ONLY if it NOT used. Therefore, downloads/streaming won\'t be stopped and sync events will be received. Data Mananger will work ONLY if data is activated
Enable or disable wifi connection. You can also enable/disable wifi outside this application, there won\'t be any conflitcts

Wifi Manager will automatically turn on/off wifi connection after a defined period of time when screen is OFF. Connection will be disabled ONLY if it NOT used. Therefore, downloads/streaming won\'t be stopped and sync events will be received. Wifi Mananger will work ONLY if wifi is activated

Auto-Sync Manager will automatically turn off all syncs when there are no connection while screen is OFF. Sync will resume once connections are re-enabled or screen is turned ON. Auto-Sync Mananger will work ONLY if Auto-Sync is activated
Enable or disable synchronizing. You can also enable/disable wifi outside this application, there won\'t be any conflitcts
Auto-Wifi Off will automatically disable wifi after after a defined period if screen is OFF and no known networks are available
Auto-Wifi On will automatically enable wifi after after a defined period if wifi is disabled and known networks are available
Number of minutes where data connectivity is ON when screen is shutdown

Number of minutes where data connectivity is kept ON after a positive data usage test done when TIME ON has expired. After this delay, an another data usage test will be executed. If data is used, this timer will restart, else time off will kick in
Number of minutes where data connectivity is OFF when screen is shutdown

Number of seconds where the application will check is data connections (Wifi/3G) are used. A greater value will decrease the chance of interrupting downloads/streaming/syncing but will keep connections alived for longer and thus consume more battery
During sleep hours all data connections will be deactivated when screen is OFF
All connectivity (3G/Wifi/Sync) will be turn off at this specific time. The ON-OFF cycle will be stopped. Connections will be automatically disabled only when screen is off
The ON-OFF cycle will be resumed at this specific time.
Generate a log named "CleverConnectivity.log" at the root of the external storage and then display it. You must have a text viewer in order to read these logs
This will stop the main service of the application e.g all features of the app. It\'s like the app is uninstalled.
This will stop the main service of the application e.g all features of the app only when the phone is PLUGGED.

When screen is turned ON, connectivity will be re-enabled after this delay (in seconds). If the screen is turned off before the delay expires, the ON-OFF cycle will continue as normal. For example, this will allow to answer calls without disturbing the ON-OFF cycle
When the screen is just turned off, this timer will kick in instead of the regular Time On. But after expiration of Time Off, it\'s still the regular Time On that will be taken into consideration.

The preferred network mode will be set when screen is OFF. When screen will be turned on, 3G mode will be re-enabled. Kindly note, if you set the preferred network to 2G in settings, it won\'t override it
Sorry, you have to be on CYANOGENMOD based rom to unlock this feature
When one of selected application is running, connecitivty won\'t be disabled
Checks wether the phone is able to connect to internet via the wifi connection. If it not the case, wifi is disabled.
Connectivity will be re-enabled when the lockscreen is removed by the user (instead of re-activating connectivity when screen is turned on)
If bluetooth is on, it will be deactivated during sleep hours. It will re-activated when sleep mode is finished
Display a fancy notification in the notification when the application is started
Sleep mode will be automatically triggered when battery level is less or equal than the specied value
